text: Aubrey David Nicholas Jasper de Grey (born 20 April 1963) is an English author and ageing researcher. He is the Chief Science Officer of the SENS Research Foundation and VP of New Technology Discovery at AgeX Therapeutics, Inc. ==Early life== De Grey was born and brought up in London, England. == Views == === Aging === De Grey thinks that it will be possible to reverse aging. He thinks that the first human who will live more than 1,000 years was born. === Cryonics === De Grey is a cryonicist. He signed up with Alcor. == Related pages == === Terms coined by Aubrey de Grey === * * Pro-aging trance == References == == Bibliography == * The Mitochondrial Free Radical Theory of Aging (1999, Cambridge University Press) * Strategies for Engineered Negligible Senescence: Why Genuine Control Of Aging May Be Foreseeable (Annals of the New York Academy of Sciences, 2004) * Ending Aging: The Rejuvenation Breakthroughs That Could Reverse Human Aging in Our Lifetime (with Michael Rae) (St. Martin's Press, 2008) * == Other websites == * Aubrey de Grey at TED * 'We will be able to live to 1,000' Interview with BBC website, outlining views * * Aubrey de Grey: "Aging is emphatically not an inescapable destiny" Tendencias21, Mars 2013 Category:Gerontology Category:Science Category:Writers from London Category:Nutrition Category:People educated at Harrow School Category:1963 births Category:Living people
